Posts.Content: Aug 2, 2008 04:30PM maryjohns10 wrote: Hi everyone: I  just joined, and want to reassure the person that asked about a mastectomy. I had one to my left breast a little over a week ago, and agree with the person that said there was little or no pain. I just experienced uncomfortableness, and now that the drain has been removed, I am a little sore from the fluid build-up. But other than that, I was amazed at how easy the surgery was. I am pretty tired still, but that's not too bad either. Everyone that sees me is amazed - I think they imagine me a superwoman or something of that sort, but I'm not! I'm just a woman with breast cancer that did what she had to do.
Posts.Title: masectomy - seems like this sucks rseaw22 Mandy1313
